mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspBrndCtgry Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ DSP_CTGRY_NO , DSP_BRND_ID , DSP_CTGRY_NM , GOD_DSP_UNIT_CD , DSP_GOD_SORT_STDR_CD , DSP_YN , SPCIFY_URL_DSP_YN , CTGRY_OUTPT_TP_CD , OUTPT_SECT_CD , OUTPT_LINK_URL , EXPSR_LVL_CD , RPRST_IMG_FILE_NM , RPRST_IMG_FILE_URL , RPRST_IMG_ALTRTV_CONT , BCRN_STYLE_CLASS_ID , SORT_SEQ , PC_LIST_EXPSR_CNT_CD , MOBILE_LIST_EXPSR_CNT_CD , LIST_EXPSR_IMG_TURN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM DSP_BRND_CTGRY WHERE 1 = 1 AND DSP_CTGRY_NO = #{dspCtgryNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DSP_BRND_ID = #{dspBrndId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
